general_advisory: â€¢ Provide light irrigation to cole crops as required. Seeing the clear sky, farmers can apply spraying activities. Regularly monitor the crop fields for the insect and disease infestation. Make provisions for light bulbs or heater to provide enough heat to the chicks.

advisory: Sowing
Spray Pendimethalin 30% EC @1.2 liter/acre in 200 lt of water within 1-2 days of sowing to control weeds.
Maturity -Harvesting
Older plants become stunted.
Collect and destroy the damaged and dead plants
Light trap @1/ha to attract and kill adults
Spray neem oil 2ml/lit.
Maturity
Cauliflower borer can be managed by manually destroying the borers.
In case of heavy infestation of borers spray Cartap hydrochloride @ 6 g/15 Liters of water.
Maturity -Harvesting
Harvest the matured banana bunch and cover the unripened bunch with bags to protect it from monkeys and birds.
Keep the banana bunch at safe places away from ants and rats
White fly
Nymphs suck sap from the leaves and lower their vitality
Yellowing and curling of leaf
Give timely irrigation to avoid infestation.
Spray dimethoate 0.3%
To avoid freezing winter, the following cares can be taken.
Reduce humidity to ensure better ventilation, preventing excessive moisture in sheds, roof dripping and ground freezing phenomenon.
Ventilation should be carried in afternoon.
Less water should be used in winter barn to wash the ground and dry cleaning should be followed.
Bedding should be provided to protect them from cold floor.
Lukewarm water should be provided for drinking purpose.
Make provisions for light bulbs or heater to provide enough heat to the chicks.
Along with the vaccination provide suitable amount of heat for first 2 -3 weeks.
Reduce the humidity of the floor and clean the litter regularly.
